title: Rare Monster Variants
description: Some monsters possess rare variants with unique abilities and appearances.

pages.text: Rare monster variants are seldom seen, but pose a significant threat to the unprepared.
Shadow Wraiths are elusive and deadly, striking from the darkness.
Frost Skeletons are imbued with chilling power, freezing their foes.
Frost Skeletons can slow and weaken those they attack, making them especially dangerous.
